## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | This order size, when combined with current stock, will provide enough units to cover predicted demand, while also factoring in a margin of error and accounting for lead time. It also provides the opportunity for a potential discount due to the minimum purchase quantity. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The recommended order size is 5,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase, which accounts for potential sales fluctuations and ensures sufficient stock availability over the next 5 days. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.75 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.5 days                                  |
| Comments                          | This recommendation considers current stock levels and potential demand variability. Multiple vendor order quantities were evaluated to ensure a combination that meets the forecasted demand and minimizes leftover stock. The order size allows for potential discount benefits while maintaining an optimal stock level. |
